pl.zankowski.yahoofinanceapi

Class RequestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.zankowski.yahoofinanceapi.RequestUtils

  • public class RequestUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    Date: 22.09.2015

    This class provides bunch of methods facilitating making custom and forex requests - Session.reqCustomData(int, String, String, int), Session.reqForexData(int, ForexCurrency, ForexCurrency, int).

    Author:
    Wojciech Zankowski

      static java.lang.String convertToCurrencyPairCode(ForexCurrency fromCurrency, ForexCurrency toCurrency)
      This method converts Currency to String currency pair needed for Forex request - Session.reqForexData(int, ForexCurrency, ForexCurrency, int).
      static java.lang.String toDataTypes(DataType... dataTypes)
      This method converts all passed Data Types to one String object that fits custom and forex requests - Session.reqCustomData(int, String, String, int), Session.reqForexData(int, ForexCurrency, ForexCurrency, int).
      static java.lang.String toInstruments(Contract... contracts)
      This method converts all passed Data Types to one String object that fits custom request - Session.reqCustomData(int, String, String, int).

      • toDataTypes

        public static java.lang.String toDataTypes(DataType... dataTypes)
        This method converts all passed Data Types to one String object that fits custom and forex requests - Session.reqCustomData(int, String, String, int), Session.reqForexData(int, ForexCurrency, ForexCurrency, int).
        Parameters:
        dataTypes - Data Types for conversion.
        Returns:
        Aggregated data types.

      • toInstruments

        Returns:

      • convertToCurrencyPairCode

        public static java.lang.String convertToCurrencyPairCode(ForexCurrency fromCurrency,
                                                         ForexCurrency toCurrency)
        This method converts Currency to String currency pair needed for Forex request - Session.reqForexData(int, ForexCurrency, ForexCurrency, int).
        Parameters:
        fromCurrency - ForexCurrency value.
        toCurrency - ForexCurrency value.
        Returns:
        Converted to currency pair.
